Welcome to NextVan! By using our app, you agree to our terms: 

1. You must use our service lawfully. 
2. We are not responsible for lost or stolen items. 
3. Booking fees are non-refundable. 
4. Data privacy is important to us. See our Privacy Policy for more details. 

By clicking OK, you agree to these terms.

We respect your privacy. Your data is securely stored and never shared with third parties without your consent.


1. **Data Collection:** We collect personal data such as name, contact details, and booking history to enhance your experience.

2. **Data Usage:** Your data is used for booking management, customer support, and service improvements.

3. **Data Protection:** We implement strict security measures to safeguard your information.

4. **Third-Party Sharing:** We do not share your personal data with third parties except when required by law or to provide essential services.

5. **User Rights:** You can request data deletion or modification at any time through our support team.

6. **Cookies and Tracking:** We may use cookies to improve app performance and personalize your experience.


By using NextVan, you agree to our Privacy Policy.

Welcome to the Help Centre! Here are answers to common questions:
\n1. **How do I book a ride?** Open the app, enter your departure and destination, and select an available ride.
\n2. **How can I cancel my booking?** Go to "My Bookings," select your trip, and choose "Cancel."
\n3. **How do I contact support?** Email us at support@nextvan.com or call our hotline.
\nNeed further assistance? Contact our support team anytime!
